title: How do I train Google's voice text to spell names correctly?
content:
The names of some of my frequent contacts are spelled differently than Google's default dictionary. When using voice to text, names like "Jessi" default to "Jesse" and "Shaun" defaults to "Shawn".
How do I change the settings or train the voice to match the correct spellings of these people in my contacts?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
